channel.title: Research on Pratheepa Jeganathan
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Pratheepa Jeganathan

item.title: Statistical Methods for Multidomain Data
item.description: Integrating Microbiome and CyTOF data Modeling the Dynamical Interactions Integrating Microbiome and CyTOF data High-throughput and mass cytometry technologies have revolutionized the quantification of human diseases with molecular and biological multiple mediators. The data produced by these techniques are complex in nature because of high-dimensionality, heterogeneity, multi-domain, and dependency. I am currently working on establishing a data structure and workflow for storing, processing, transforming, visualizing multi-domain data.

item.title: Statistical Methods for Microbiome Data
item.description: Block Bootstrap Method Method Software Paper Bayesian Inference for Removing DNA Contaminants in Low-Biomass Samples Software Paper(s) References Block Bootstrap Method Rapidly evolving high-throughput sequencing technology enables the comprehensive search for microbial biomarkers using longitudinal experiments. Such experiments consist of repeated biological observations from each subject over time and are essential in accounting for the high between-subject and within-subject variability. Longitudinal microbiome data are used to either model abundance over time or compare the abundances of bacteria between two or more cohorts.

item.title: Microbiome Studies
item.description: We are working on establishing a workflow for analyzing metagenomics data in agriculture.

item.title: Saddlepoint Approximations in Statistics
item.description: Multivariate Saddlepoint-Based Bootstrap Method (mSPBB) Method Software Paper Saddlepoint Approximation for Bivariate Cumultative Distribution Function (CDF) Correction to the formula Software Paper Empirical Saddlepoint Approximations for Smoothing Survival Functions Under Right Censoring. Method Software Paper Saddlepoint-Based Bootstrap Method (SPBB) Method Software Paper Multivariate Saddlepoint-Based Bootstrap Method (mSPBB) The second project for my PhD dissertation was to generalize the SPBB method to make inferences on the multiple parameters of a statistical model.
